ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: so that you may have anything in it you choose?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: That you can surely have whatever you choose?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: that (in the Hereafter) you shall have all that you choose for yourselves?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: that tells you to do whatever you want?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: - That for you in it is whatever you like?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: That you shall therein have all that you choose
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: That you have surely therein what you choose?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely therein you shall have whatever you choose!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: That ye shall indeed have all that ye choose?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: that you will be granted whatever you choose?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: That therein is yours that which. ye may choose?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: that you shall have in it whatever you choose?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: That ye shall have, through it whatever ye choose?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: That you shall have all that you choose?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: surely in it you shall have whatever you choose!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Wherein there is whatever you choose?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: That indeed for you is whatever you choose?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [68:38] that you will indeed have in it whatever you choose?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 685 (That you shall indeed have) in this Scripture (all that ye choose) all you desire in Paradise in the Hereafter?
